name: Hockey Master
description:
Beat your friend by making the first goal!

Use the joystick to control your player (Forward,Back,Left, Right). Protect your home as well.

Check out how good you can play with it's simple controls.  Protect your pole from your opponent!!!

Hockey MASTER

I was inspired to make this game

Description:

  • Supports Android 5 or up
  • 1GB RAM or more
  • No Permissions requested
  • v.2022.03.23
